title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and slouch cap sitting with holstered revolver and cavalry saber] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and slouch cap sitting with holstered revolver and cavalry saber] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.3 x 8.1 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather floral motif. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
